title: Up All Night(Dream on)
lyrics:
What you think a
What you think a think about it
Neowa hamkke iss-eulttaemyeon nan salajyeo nae bam-i
Oneul bam-e neowa jjanhago naseo salajyeoss-eo jam-i
Beolsseo myeochil jjaeleul have I been stayin' up

Sick and tired but now I'm wired

The way you move

Your thang got me litted on fire

Neoga umjig-ineun moseub bolttaemyeon naui simjang-i anmeomchwo

Naega neowa lideum majchulttaeen

Get your head bumpin'



Neon naege haelobjiman jakkuman saelobji

Naega museunjis-eul haeya neoga mam-eul naenoh-eulji

I've been there and I've done that

Geu mueosdo jaemieobsjiman

Jigeum isungan-eul meomchullae amu banghae eobs-i



Hanaui jagpumgat-a from the internet

Naega domang galyeohaedo you just bring it back

Naneun oneul bamdo jam mosja ni saeng-gag-e

Eonjedeunji just say my name

Nan junbi dwaess-eo take my hand



Swibge ppajil geosman gat-a

Mwonga hollin geosman gat-a jakku tteollige hane

Ppanhi bol ttaen singihaejyeo ppeonhaji anhge neukkyeojyeo

Neolang nalang oneulbam-e dream on

Dance

Oh what do you know

I think I'm in love

Dance

Salang-e ppajin geos man gat-a

Neol bolttaemyeon sum-i gapa

We gon' stay up all night



Dance

We gon' stay up all night

We gon' stay up all night

We gon' stay up all night

All night Dance

We gon' stay up all night

We gon' stay up all night

We gon' stay up all night



Chingudeul-i malhae ije jebal geumanhae

Jib-e deul-eoga chimdaee nuwoseo ibul-an-e

Ttatteushage iss-eo neo geuleodaga jakkuman mom deo sanghae

Pug jom swieo go to sleep ibeon jumal-en



But i dont wanna miss it

Hansungan-ilado nohchigo sipjianh-a

Os-eul ibgo dasi nan tto neoegelo ga

Dressin' fancy bow ties

Sentimental blown mind

Neoe daehan saeng-gagdeul-i muneojyeo domino



Geulaedo nan keun geulim-eul bol jul al-a

Look at the big picture

Dominoneun muneojigo naseoya meos-iss-eo

Jakku heundeullineun nae mam nol-iteoui siso

Naneun chum-eul chugo neoneun gyeou juji naege siseon



Hey naneun jom eottae

Why you actin' like

I'm no one special just a friend

Dasi mul-eulge

Nege nan eottae

Chingulado joh-euni oneul bamsae nawa dance



Energy drinks

Double shots

Deul-i deul-i bueo
